comments:
2.0 RC4

A tag file containing a tag directive with a bad small-icon attribute will cause an exception when content assist is invoked and the tag is meant to be shown.  The content assist popup will not appear.

Fixed in 2.0.1.  The SWTException itself is caught as recommended by ImageData's constructor.
